Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 3.2.3

==Policy Statement==

Do not store PINs.

==Policy Purpose==

The cardholder PIN is used for authentication at ATMs. This makes it of high value to an attacker. In the rare event it is required for a transaction; it should not be stored after the transaction has been processed.

==Related Guidance==

* [[c05b8c53-3f76-4569-b212-177d5a208b00|Do Not Store Particularly Sensitive Cardholder Data]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[fd15d30d-8132-48fc-8962-870f096eff3b|Particularly Sensitive Cardholder Data Is Not Stored]]
